./printmarker 1 ../samples/Hexagons/HEXAGON1/hexagon.svg ../samples/Hexagons/HEXAGON1/images/hexagon_ ../samples/Hexagons/HEXAGON1/config.yml -e 10 -ncrcbits 16

./markerdetector ../samples/Hexagons/HEXAGON1/images/hexagon_0001.png ../samples/Hexagons/HEXAGON1/config.yml

./markerdetector ../samples/Hexagons/HEXAGON1/test.mp4 ../samples/Hexagons/HEXAGON1/config.yml
./markerdetector ../samples/DUAL/test.mp4 ../samples/Hexagons/HEXAGON1/config.yml


// Dual
